member.name: T:SwForAll.Platform.Configuration.ConfigHelper
member.summary: Provides generic configuration services required by all applications having an App.config file. Main advantage of using this utility class is that it removes an application's direct dependency to System.Configuration assembly.

member.name: M:SwForAll.Platform.Configuration.ConfigHelper.GetAppSettings(System.String)
member.summary: Given the name of an existing appSettings item in current application's default configuration file, returns value for that item.
member.param: The name of an existing appSettings item in current application's default configuration
member.returns: The value of the appSettings item specified by name.
member.exception: Given name is a null reference.
Given name is an empty string.

member.name: M:SwForAll.Platform.Configuration.ConfigHelper.GetConnectionString(System.Int32)
member.summary: Given the zero-based index of a connection string item in current application's default configuration file, returns value for that item.
member.param: The zero-based index of a connection string item in current application's default configuration file.
member.returns: The value of the connection string item specified by index.
member.exception: Given index is less than zero.

member.name: M:SwForAll.Platform.Configuration.ConfigHelper.GetConnectionString(System.String)
member.summary: Given the name of an existing connection string item in current application's default configuration file, returns value for that item.
member.param: The name of an existing connection string item in current application's default configuration file.
member.returns: The value of the connection string item specified by name.
member.exception: Given name is a null reference.
Given name is an empty string.

member.name: M:SwForAll.Platform.Configuration.ConfigHelper.GetConnectionProvider(System.String)
member.summary: Given the name of an existing connection string item in current application's default configuration file, returns Provider attribute for that item.
member.param: The name of an existing connection string item in current application's default configuration file.
member.returns: The Provider attribute of the connection string item specified by name.

member.name: T:SwForAll.Platform.Configuration.CommandElement
member.summary: Defines configuration settings for a context menu command.

member.name: M:SwForAll.Platform.Configuration.CommandElement.#ctor
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of CommandElement class.

member.name: P:SwForAll.Platform.Configuration.CommandElement.CommandType
member.summary: Type of command (based on general type of target object). Valid values are item, collection and object.

member.name: P:SwForAll.Platform.Configuration.CommandElement.TargetType
member.summary: Name of metadata class used as a target for this command. When not set, command is considered a default command.

member.name: P:SwForAll.Platform.Configuration.CommandElement.Name
member.summary: Design-time name of this command.

member.name: P:SwForAll.Platform.Configuration.CommandElement.Title
member.summary: Title of user interface element that invokes this command.

member.name: P:SwForAll.Platform.Configuration.CommandElement.Parent
member.summary: Title of parent user interface element that contains this command's user interface element.

member.name: P:SwForAll.Platform.Configuration.CommandElement.Parameters
member.summary: A collection of parameters required for successful execution of this command.

member.name: P:SwForAll.Platform.Configuration.CommandElement.HandlerTypeName
member.summary: Fully-qualified type name of command class that implements functionality relevant to this command.

member.name: P:SwForAll.Platform.Configuration.CommandElement.NeedsInput
member.summary: true if this command requires input provided in a form; otherwise false.

member.name: M:SwForAll.Platform.Configuration.CommandElement.DeserializeElement(System.Xml.XmlReader,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Reads XML from the configuration file.
member.param: The XmlReader that reads from the configuration file.
true to serialize only the collection key properties; otherwise, false.

member.name: M:SwForAll.Platform.Configuration.CommandElement.SerializeElement(System.Xml.XmlWriter,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Writes the contents of this configuration element to the configuration file when implemented in a derived class.
member.param: The XmlWriter that writes to the configuration file.
true to serialize only the collection key properties; otherwise, false.
member.returns: true if any data was actually serialized; otherwise, false.

member.name: M:SwForAll.Platform.Configuration.CommandElement.IsModified
member.summary: Indicates whether this configuration element has been modified since it was last saved or loaded, when implemented in a derived class.
member.returns: true if the element has been modified; otherwise, false.

member.summary: Defines configuration settings for a collection of context menu commands.

member.summary: Gets the type of the ConfigurationElementCollection.

member.summary: Adds a collection-specific configuration element to the ConfigurationElementCollection.

member.summary: Adds a configuration element to the ConfigurationElementCollection.

member.summary: Removes a ConfigurationElement from the collection.

member.summary: Initializes a new instance of MetaDesignerSection class.

member.summary: A collection of file generator configurations in this section

member.summary: A collection of custom command configurations in this section.

member.summary: A collection of default command configurations in this section.

member.summary: A collection of metadata editor configurations in this section.

member.summary: Reads XML from the configuration file.
member.param: The XmlReader object, which reads from the configuration file.

member.name: M:SwForAll.Platform.Configuration.MetaDesignerSection.SerializeSection(System.Configuration.ConfigurationElement,System.String,System.Configuration.ConfigurationSaveMode)
member.summary: Creates an XML string containing an unmerged view of the ConfigurationSection object as a single section to write to a file.
member.param: The ConfigurationElement instance to use as the parent when performing the un-merge.
The name of the section to create.
The ConfigurationSaveMode instance to use when writing to a string.
member.returns: An XML string containing an unmerged view of the ConfigurationSection object.

member.name: T:SwForAll.Platform.Configuration.MetaDesignerSectionHandler
member.summary: Provides a convenient wrapper for accessing top-level configuration items in MetaDesignerSection class.

member.name: P:SwForAll.Platform.Configuration.MetaDesignerSectionHandler.Section
member.summary: Gets the custom configuration section populated with data from 'swforall.platform.metaDesigner' element in application configuration file.
